Package renderer.core.mesh

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderer.core.mesh.Scene
  • public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that describes a simple 3D Scene: * the Mesh objects composing the scene * the World-to-Camera transformation * the Lights and their parameters This description is meant to be read form a scene description file (.scene extension).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Scene​(java.lang.String filename)
      Creates a new Scene object by reading in a scene description file.

      • Scene

        public Scene​(java.lang.String filename)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new Scene object by reading in a scene description file.
        Parameters:
        filename - path to the scene description file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file is not a valid scene description file.
